com.stormpath.sdk.convert

Class Conversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.sdk.convert.Conversions

  • public final class Conversions
extends Object
    A utility method class that enhances working with and constructing Conversion rules/chains.
    Since:
    1.3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Conversion disabled()
      Returns a new Conversion that is disabled.
      static ElementsConversion each(Conversion conversion)
      Returns a new ElementsConversion instance where each element will be converted according to the specified conversion argument.
      static Conversion withField(String name, Conversion c)
      Returns a new Conversion instance that contains a field that should be converted according to the specified conversion argument.
      static Conversion withStrategy(ConversionStrategyName name)
      Returns a new Conversion instance that uses the specified strategy.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • disabled

        public static Conversion disabled()
        Returns a new Conversion that is disabled.
        Returns:
        a new Conversion that is disabled.

      • withField

        public static Conversion withField(String name,
                                   Conversion c)
        Returns a new Conversion instance that contains a field that should be converted according to the specified conversion argument. That is, the specified argument applies to the object's named field, not the object itself.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of a field on an object to convert
        c - the conversion rules to apply when encountering the named field's value
        Returns:
        a new Conversion instance that contains a field that should be converted according to the specified conversion argument.

      • withStrategy

        public static Conversion withStrategy(ConversionStrategyName name)
        Returns a new Conversion instance that uses the specified strategy.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the strategy to use when converting an input object.
        Returns:
        a new Conversion instance that uses the specified strategy.

      • each

        public static ElementsConversion each(Conversion conversion)
        Returns a new ElementsConversion instance where each element will be converted according to the specified conversion argument.
        Parameters:
        conversion - a new ElementsConversion instance where each element will be converted according to the specified conversion argument.
        Returns:
        a new ElementsConversion instance where each element will be converted according to the specified conversion argument.
